Song.title: I Love Your Kingdom, Lord
Song.copyright: Adapted from “I Love Thy Kingdom, Lord” by Timothy Dwight. Alternate words by Jon Bloom. Music by Jon Bloom. © 2006 Jon Bloom. Used by permission. All rights reserved.

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: I [E]love your kingdom, [B/D#]Lord The h[F#m7]ouse where [A/C#]you res[Bsus]ide [B] The p[E]eople p[B/D#]urchased [C#m]with your bl[E/G#]ood When [A/C#]on the cr[B]oss you d[E]ied
VERSE 2: I [E]love your bride, O [B/D#]Lord For s[F#m7]he is [A/C#]your de[Bsus]light [B] No st[E]ain of s[B/D#]in rem[C#m]ains on [E/G#]her You’ve d[A/C#]ressed her [B]all in wh[E]ite
VERSE 3: I [E]love your church, O [B/D#]God Wher[F#m7]ever [A/C#]she may [Bsus]be [B] For [E]what is [B/D#]dear to [C#m]you, O [E/G#]Lord Is [A/C#]also d[B]ear to m[E]e
VERSE 4: I [E]love your church, O [B/D#]Lord The s[F#m7]aints you’ve [A/C#]given m[Bsus]e [B] To [E]live with [B/D#]and to h[C#m]umbly s[E/G#]erve And [A/C#]pray for f[B]aithfull[E]y
VERSE 5: For your ch[A]urch my tears shall[E/G#] fall And for [D2]her my prayers asc[A]end To [F#m7]her my cares and t[E/G#]oils be given Un[D2]til my life shall [Bsus B]end
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i love your kingdom lord the house where you reside the people purchased with your blood when on the cross you died verse 2 i love your bride o lord for she is your delight no stain of sin remains on her youve dressed her all in white verse 3 i love your church o god wherever she may be for what is dear to you o lord is also dear to me verse 4 i love your church o lord the saints youve given me to live with and to humbly serve and pray for faithfully verse 5 for your church my tears shall fall and for her my prayers ascend to her my cares and toils be given until my life shall end

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: I [E]love your kingdom, [B/D#]Lord The h[F#m7]ouse where [A/C#]you res[Bsus]ide [B] The p[E]eople p[B/D#]urchased [C#m]with your bl[E/G#]ood When [A/C#]on the cr[B]oss you d[E]ied
I [E]love your bride, O [B/D#]Lord For s[F#m7]he is [A/C#]your de[Bsus]light [B] No st[E]ain of s[B/D#]in rem[C#m]ains on [E/G#]her You’ve d[A/C#]ressed her [B]all in wh[E]ite
CHORUS: For your ch[A]urch my tears shall[E/G#] fall For [D2]her my prayers asc[A]end To [F#m7]her my cares and t[E/G#]oils be given Un[D2]til my life shall [Bsus B]end
VERSE 2: I [E]love your church, O [B/D#]God Wher[F#m7]ever [A/C#]she may [Bsus]be [B] For [E]what is [B/D#]dear to [C#m]you, O [E/G#]Lord Is [A/C#]also d[B]ear to m[E]e
I [E]love your church, O [B/D#]Lord The s[F#m7]aints you’ve [A/C#]given m[Bsus]e [B] To [E]live with [B/D#]and to h[C#m]umbly s[E/G#]erve And [A/C#]pray for f[B]aithfull[E]y
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i love your kingdom lord the house where you reside the people purchased with your blood when on the cross you died i love your bride o lord for she is your delight no stain of sin remains on her youve dressed her all in white chorus for your church my tears shall fall for her my prayers ascend to her my cares and toils be given until my life shall end verse 2 i love your church o god wherever she may be for what is dear to you o lord is also dear to me i love your church o lord the saints youve given me to live with and to humbly serve and pray for faithfully

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: I [F]love your kingdom, [C]Lord, the h[F]ouse where [Gm]you res[Csus]ide; [C] The p[F]eople p[C/E]urchased [Dm]with your bl[Am]ood when [Bb]on the cr[F/C]oss y[C]ou d[F]ied. [Alternate Ending] (when [Bb]on the cr[F/C]oss y[C]ou d[Bb/F]ied.) [F]
Verse 2: I [F]love your bride, O [C]Lord, for s[F]he is [Gm]your de[Csus]light; [C] No st[F]ain of s[C/E]in rem[Dm]ains on [Am]her, You’ve d[Bb]ressed her [F/C]all [C]in wh[F]ite. [Alternate Ending] (You’ve d[Bb]ressed her [F/C]all [C]in wh[Bb/F]ite.) [F]
CHORUS (2x): For your ch[Bb]urch my tears shall[F/A] fall For [Eb]her my prayers asc[Bb]end To [Gm]her my cares and t[F/A]oils be given Un[Eb]til my life shall [Csus]end [C]
VERSE 3: I [F]love your church, O [C]God, wher[F]ever [Gm]she may [Csus]be; [C] For [F]what is [C/E]dear to [Dm]you, O [Am]Lord is [Bb]also d[F/C]ear [C]to m[F]e.
Verse 4: I [F]love your church, O [C]Lord, the s[F]aints you’ve [Gm]given m[Csus]e [C] To [F]live with [C/E]and to h[Dm]umbly s[Am]erve and [Bb]pray for f[F/C]aith[C]full[F]y.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i love your kingdom lord the house where you reside the people purchased with your blood when on the cross you died when on the cross you died verse 2 i love your bride o lord for she is your delight no stain of sin remains on her youve dressed her all in white youve dressed her all in white chorus 2x for your church my tears shall fall for her my prayers ascend to her my cares and toils be given until my life shall end verse 3 i love your church o god wherever she may be for what is dear to you o lord is also dear to me verse 4 i love your church o lord the saints youve given me to live with and to humbly serve and pray for faithfully

Arrangement.description: Updated Chords (Capo 3 to D) by Rob Brock
Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: I [D]love your kingdom, [A]Lord, the h[D]ouse where [Em]you res[Asus]ide; [A] The p[D]eople p[A/C#]urchased [Bm]with your bl[F#m]ood when [G]on the cr[D/A]oss y[A]ou d[D]ied. [Alternate Ending] (when [G]on the cr[D/A]oss y[A]ou d[G/D]ied.) [D]
Verse 2: I [D]love your bride, O [A]Lord, for s[D]he is [Em]your de[Asus]light; [A] No st[D]ain of s[A/C#]in rem[Bm]ains on [F#m]her, You’ve d[G]ressed her [D/A]all [A]in wh[D]ite. [Alternate Ending] (You’ve d[G]ressed her [D/A]all [A]in wh[G/D]ite.) [D]
CHORUS (2x): For your ch[G]urch my tears shall[D/F#] fall For [C]her my prayers asc[G]end To [Em]her my cares and t[D/F#]oils be given Un[C]til my life shall [Asus]end [A]
VERSE 3: I [D]love your church, O [A]God, wher[D]ever [Em]she may [Asus]be; [A] For [D]what is [A/C#]dear to [Bm]you, O [F#m]Lord is [G]also d[D/A]ear [A]to m[D]e.
Verse 4: I [D]love your church, O [A]Lord, the s[D]aints you’ve [Em]given m[Asus]e [A] To [D]live with [A/C#]and to h[Bm]umbly s[F#m]erve and [G]pray for f[D/A]aith[A]full[D]y.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i love your kingdom lord the house where you reside the people purchased with your blood when on the cross you died when on the cross you died verse 2 i love your bride o lord for she is your delight no stain of sin remains on her youve dressed her all in white youve dressed her all in white chorus 2x for your church my tears shall fall for her my prayers ascend to her my cares and toils be given until my life shall end verse 3 i love your church o god wherever she may be for what is dear to you o lord is also dear to me verse 4 i love your church o lord the saints youve given me to live with and to humbly serve and pray for faithfully
